name: kollaps
description:
This game builds on the heritage of Asteroids and Spacewar! adding local multiplayer mayhem and physics to the mix.

The entire 59 hours, 17 minutes and 46 seconds of development time (yes, everything) on this game has been live streamed. You can view the entire thing on YouTube.

Music and sounds by Niklas Ström.

Support requests go to support@grapefrukt.com
